think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the 'synchronous_commit' knob in PostgreSQL. 2. Determine if it has a natural order of values. 3. Check if it has special values like -1 or 0 that alter its function significantly. 4. Evaluate the behavior of the knob when set to these special values versus regular numerical values. 5. Conclude whether it is classified as a special knob based on the presence of special values and their functions.
